title: SME Connext Dashboard v.2
description: The Office of Small and Medium Enterprises Promotion (OSMEP) develops web applications and digital platforms such as SME Single Platform and SME Big Data Dashboard to serve as a comprehensive service center for Thai SME entrepreneurs.

title: SME Profile Dashboard v.2
description: A centralized database website that consolidates data from SMEs (Small and Medium Enterprises) and government agencies to enable data integration and utilization for analyzing entrepreneurial demand trends and efficiently presenting government services and support.

title: Lanna-Koyori Project
description: Koyori project website, a collaboration between Thai and Japanese designers with artisans in Northern Thailand, operated under the Lanna Culture and Handicraft Association (LCCA) and Rajamangala University of Technology Lanna.
